Description: User-friendly resourcing tool to help making resource plans easily and provide a clear view your company’s resource allocations.
Name: Silverbucket

Methods.Name: Get Project
Methods.Description: Gets details of a Project.

Methods.Name: Add Project
Methods.Description: Add a Project.

Methods.Name: List Projects
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Projects.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get the details of a specific User.

Methods.Name: Find Users By Email
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Users matching the supplied email address.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Users.

Methods.Name: Add User
Methods.Description: Add a new User.

Methods.Name: Update User
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a User.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified Customer.

Methods.Name: Find Customers by Name
Methods.Description: Searches for Customers whose name includes the specified text.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Customers.

Methods.Name: List Roles By Project
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Roles for the specified Project.

Methods.Name: Get Project Role
Methods.Description: Gets details of a specific Project Role.

Methods.Name: List Project Roles
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Project Roles.

Methods.Name: List Tasks By Project
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Tasks for the specified Project.

Methods.Name: Get Project Task
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified Project Task.

Methods.Name: List Project Tasks
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Project Tasks.

Methods.Name: Update Actual
Methods.Description: Adds a record.

Methods.Name: Add Actual
Methods.Description: Adds a record.

Methods.Name: List Actuals
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Actuals.

Methods.Name: Add Actuals
Methods.Description: Add an array of time records.

Methods.Name: List Roles
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Roles.

Methods.Name: List Allocations
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Allocations.
